name: A Blind Fox's Tale
description:
Play as a blind fox, try to survive the wildness with your other senses. I encourage the use of headphones to play this game, or at least a stereo output :)

Can you make it to the end? ^^

The lights surrounding the fox and other objects represent the other fox's senses (smell, hearing).

This is a Game Jam's entry, #GAMESMADEQUICK3DASH2 and I'm treating it as a prototype. If I have a good enough feedback from it, I might make a full game out of it :)

Controls:

Left and Right arrows - control the fox

Spacebar - Jump
